name: EVRYVirtualAssistant
0:
”Alexa, start EVA”
”Alexa, ask EVA what are the demo solutions showcased today?”
”Alexa, ask EVA what is Tech Utsav”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eva
des:
EVA - EVRY Virtual Assistant.

A virtual assistant for EVRY's technical event, Tech Utsav - 2018.
Tech Utsav provides employees a stage for showcasing their innovative ideas to solve business problems using emerging digital technologies.

Objective of this skill is to assists employees in getting details about demos showcased in Tech Utsav i.e. to find demo solutions of their interest by giving demos based on either Popularity or Technology or Industry, about Tech Utsav event, about digital community and about EVA (EVRY Virtual Assistant).

The skill interestingly provides you custom humorous responses when user tried accessing some of the generic skills (like music, news, weather) or about how is she doing and about her gender in middle of current session.

Few things to try…
• “Ask EVA which are the popular demos”
• “Tell EVA to name the demos based on technology”
• “Tell EVA to list the demos based on industry”
• “Ask EVA to talk about Digital Community”
• “Tell EVA to speak about herself”
• “Ask EVA about Tech Utsav event”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
